input_args.passage: 'Bio | Anthony Doerr was born and raised in Cleveland, Ohio. He is the author of the story collections The Shell Collector and Memory Wall, the memoir Four Seasons ...'
input_args.claim: 'This is further confirmed by which states that Anthony Doerr, born on October 27, 1973, is an American author of novels and short stories, with his 2014 novel All the Light gaining widespread recognition.'
